com.tinfoil.sms.sms

Class KeyExchangeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.tinfoil.sms.sms.KeyExchangeManager

  • public class KeyExchangeManager
extends Activity
    The activity for handling pending key exchanges. If the user does not set the contact's shared secrets or the contact's incoming key exchange messages are set to be handled manually.

      • exchangeKey

        public void exchangeKey(View view)
        The onClick action for when the exchange key message is pressed. Sends a key exchange message for each contact that is selected.
        Parameters:
        view - The View

      • setAndSend

        public static void setAndSend(Context context,
              Number number,
              java.lang.String name,
              Entry entry)
        Set the shared secrets for the contacts.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the setting.
        number - The Number of the contact.
        name - The name of the contact
        entry - The key exchange message.

      • respondMessage

        public static void respondMessage(Context context,
                  Number number,
                  Entry entry)
        Respond to the key exchange messages
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the activity
        number - The number of the contact for the key exchange
        entry - The key exchange entry received.

      • reject

        public void reject(View view)
        The onClick action for when a for when the reject button has been clicked. Deletes every key exchange message selected.
        Parameters:
        view - The View

        Update the list key exchange messages
